description:
OverviewThis HDMI to VGA adapter is a convenient and cost-effective solution for 
connecting your HDMI source device to VGA monitors or projectors. The 
adapter connects to the VGA cable of your display (VGA cable not included). It 
features a built-in active IC chip that improves compatibility and delivers 
sharp picture quality.InstructionsConnect the HDMI end of the adapter into your HDMI source and the VGA end into 
the VGA-male cable of the device. Optionally, choose to "Mirror" your computer 
screen for a presentation on a projector or "Extend" your desktop to view more 
applications. Select the display settings for a Mac in the System Preferences 
and for Windows in the Control Panel.Technical Specifications* Input/Output Signal: HDMI (Typ A) digital/VGA analog* Supported Resolutions: 
480i/480p/576i/576p/800x600/720i/720p/1280x1024/1600x1200/1080i/1080p* Supports 165MHz/1.65Gbps per channel (6.75Gbps all channel) bandwidth for HDMI* Supports analog video output up to 1600 x 1200 (UXGA) and 1080p with 10-bit 
DAC* Vertical Frequency Range: 50/60Hz* Audio Output: No* HDCP Support: No* Micro-USB Power: OptionalCompatibility* Not compatible with 
SONY PS3, or any Blu-ray DVD playersImportant Note* The micro-USB power cable may be required with the adapter for ChromeBook (made by Samsung) or Macbook Pro with Retina Display.* The VGA monitor or projector MUST support one of the resolutions listed under specifications.* This is NOT a bi-directional cable. It only transfers signal from HDMI to VGA
title: Cable Matters Gold-Plated Active HDMI to VGA Adapter (Male to Female) with 3 Ft Micro USB Cable - White
